## ProgressItem.pause() method

Pause/resume the ProgressItem

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  shouldPause | boolean | _(Optional)_ should the item be paused? Default: true |
